Game: Disney's Brother Bear 2003-11-04T00:00:00-08:00 Brother Bear allows players to play as Kenai and Koda, individually or as a team, as they go on an adventure that follows the beats of the film. The game features elements such as spectacular weather effects and cut-scenes from the film which will bring alive the world of Brother Bear. With four worlds, 16 levels and unlockable bonus games, Disney's Brother Bear for the GBA is a game of epic proportions. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/d61568af-4a5f-4b43-a4fa-9021e70cb51d.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/80282a7b-b63f-4ed9-bb38-70f115b5a1aa.jpg Platform Vicarious Visions Disney Interactive Studios
